name: Space Silly Things
description:
Join Captain Bundagoose on a silly space adventure to find the planet Dingdadongdabundun. Along the way he will have to battle many silly things until the final showdown with Bossy Boss Robot.

Collect ammo, shields and power ups in this retro space shooter.

Inspired by a short story written by my 5yo son, we both came up with the silly ideas.

Controls Keyboard - (Controller):

Move: WASD - (Left Joypad)

Fire: Space - (Right Trigger 2)

Switch Weapon: Ctrl - (X/Circle)

Boost: Shift - (A/X)

Pause: Esc - (X/Square)

If you need to invert the controls, pause the game and toggle the invert controls option
